Class Ground

  • java.lang.Object
    • GOFO.OwnerClasses.Ground
  • public class Ground
extends java.lang.Object
    this class has all the info needed about any playground and it is only exist in the Owner class

    1.0
    Author:
    mohamed mahmoud

      • signUpID

        public boolean signUpID​(java.lang.String ID)
        checks if the ID exist in the date source or not and if it there so it is not valid and return false and if it not there will return true
        Parameters:
        ID - the ID of the playGround
        Returns:
        true of the ID is valid and does not exist in the data source and false if the opposite

      • signUpName

        public boolean signUpName​(java.lang.String name)
        check to see if the name is valid or not
        Parameters:
        name - The name entered by the user
        Returns:
        true if the name is correct

      • signUpOpeningTime

        public boolean signUpOpeningTime​(int opening)
        checks if the opening time is in the valid range between 0 and 24
        Parameters:
        opening - the opening time entered by the Owner
        Returns:
        True of the opening time is valid

      • signUpClosingTime

        public boolean signUpClosingTime​(int closing)
        checks if the closing time is in the valid range between 0 and 24
        Parameters:
        closing - the closing time entered by the Owner
        Returns:
        True of the closing time is valid

      • signUpPrice

        public boolean signUpPrice​(int price)
        check is the price is valid or not it should be more than 0 and less than 20$
        Parameters:
        price - the price entered by the Owner
        Returns:
        return true of the price is valid and false if not

      • book

        public boolean book​(int start,
                    int end,
                    java.lang.String playerID)
        this method checks if the given start time and the end time is valid that it is not taken or out of the starting and ending time and if all the giving info is true it will create a Booking object and add to list of bookings
        Parameters:
        start - the starting time entered by the Player
        end - the ending time entered by the Player
        playerID - the ID of the player that is going to booking this playground
        Returns:
        return true of the gavin info is true and false if not

      • display

        public void display()
        displays all the info need for the playground and all of its bookings

      • checkBooking

        public boolean checkBooking​(int start,
                            int end)
        this method checks if the given start time and the end time is valid that it is not taken or out of the starting and ending time
        Parameters:
        start - the starting time entered by the Player
        end - the ending time entered by the Player
        Returns:
        return true of the gavin info is true and false if not
